STAT 362 R for Data Science Syllabus

STAT 362 R for Data Science Brian Ling 2020-12-08 Syllabus Course Description: Introduction to R, data creation and manipulation, data import and export, scripts and functions, control flow, debugging and profiling, data visualization, statistical inference, Monte Carlo methods, decision trees, support vector machines, neural network, numerical methods. Teacher assistant: TBD Office Hours: Intended Student Learning Outcomes: Understand
